item.title: Thornton Probate Material, 1661-1700
item.description:
The path around the reservoir makes Thornton an attractive place for walkers.

The following inventories have been transcribed for this village, which is about nine miles west of Leicester:

Nicholas Grundye, 1675

James Harrington, 1683

Henry Hunte, yeoman, 1679

Richard North, husbandman, 1679
item.dc:creator: PamF
